Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE
Reviews.Author: SC Girl
Reviews.Content: This phone does not work properly.  It physically looks free of any damage but the volume does not work and it regularly does not allow me to receive texts.  I have taken it to a service station and called the company about getting it reset but they say they don't know whats wrong with it.  HORRIBLE BUY!!!

Reviews.Title: BlackBerry 8703e Review
Reviews.Author: redfox3717
Reviews.Content: I have seen many of my supervisors use this phone, and they never had a problem. I didnt know that I'd be getting the exact same phone! It arrived very quickly, within 4 days. The only issue i had was UPS was late delivering the package, but whatever thats okay. I opened it up and turned it on to find it to be exactly the way they described. It doesnt have much in the way of fancy things, but it definitely works for texting and calls. The most notable feature so far is email integration. You receive emails like text messages.The only con is the battery life, its about 12 hours of standby, but if you dont work in the field you'll be just fine.

Reviews.Title: complete crap dont buy
Reviews.Author: M. Scanlon
Reviews.Content: this phone is horrible, it dosnt receive text sometimes and the battery malfunctions so much. charge it for 7 hours dies in 20 seconds

Reviews.Title: Great price great phone!
Reviews.Author: JAM77
Reviews.Content: Great phone great price! Shipped fast, no problems. Had read reviews about the battery not lasting long on this model, but not true with mine...my battery last 4 to 5 days on a single charge.

Reviews.Title: Suspended phone not supported by Verizon
Reviews.Author: mjarcher09
Reviews.Content: I activated this phone just fine with verizon but when i try to connect my email it says line suspended! WTF! And the Company doesn't specify their return policy online- hmmmm wonder why.... Garbage. Don't stress yourself out with this purchase. So I call blackberry and they inform me that this device is not supported by verizon! Great!

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Review
Reviews.Author: Maggie
Reviews.Content: When I received the blackberry and took it to verizon to activate, the man had told me it had been a great phone. However, the internet was not accessible for me to check my email, and one of the buttons on the phone did not work. I was disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone for the price
Reviews.Author: cdnerds
Reviews.Content: I needed a quick replacement phone. Since I had a blackberry plan already i just bought this phone with amazon prime.  I got it in 2 days and it works perfectly.  Though it does not have all the features of a newer model, what do you expect for 20 bucks?  This is a great starter phone, great quick replacement phone.  I had no problems with it at all. It activated without a problem.I was very pleased with the entire process.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone!
Reviews.Author: ABK1204
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone refurbished on Amazon.com after one of my touchscreen phones cracked. I absolutely love it! I wanted something simple that can use the web and accept email. I have 2 email accounts set up on my Blackberry now (it holds many more) and the browser is easy to use! The only downside is that it does not have a camera. I also don't receive picture messages. Other than that, it works great! My battery usually lasts 3-4 days before I have to charge it. Great for the price!

Reviews.Title: WELL...
Reviews.Author: lisalisa234
Reviews.Content: I had a hard time and still cant put service on it from Verizon; its a great cost and wonderful item i just cant put service on it if theres a trick  to it... please let me know i would love to get it up and running the Verizon pre paid would put the minutes or service on it i bought for it on phone for the said it was a refurbished phonei would love to be able to put a 5 star on it

Reviews.Title: not at all what i expected !
Reviews.Author: Maricela
Reviews.Content: very low quality super old phone, really disliked it and you cannot browse the web, its big and bulky not what I expected.

Reviews.Title: bueno
Reviews.Author: aaroncedillo
Reviews.Content: es un articulo que lo compre para juego de mi hijo menor, le gusto mucho, es muy durable, aunque no me funciono en la red de mi pais

Reviews.Title: Did not work
Reviews.Author: Catherine E. Broussard
Reviews.Content: I do not like the black berry. This particular phone never worked we'll.  tried to send back but never could. It sitting in a draw not being used.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy this.
Reviews.Author: Pamela
Reviews.Content: It is very old and looks much fancier than it really is!  Buy an iPhone instead - you will be much more satisfied with your investment.

Reviews.Title: Water Damages
Reviews.Author: rosair97
Reviews.Content: when you open the phone the sticker in the back is re, which indicate have a water damages as well of the battery

Reviews.Title: I love this phone...
Reviews.Author: Wine Geek
Reviews.Content: I still use this phone everyday. It does everything I want except it does not have a camera. So what? I buy them new online for 70 dollars and could not care less if I lose it or damage it. I have everything backed up and keep a few phones on had so I am never without a phone. Also I do not have to sign a new contract so I can cancel my service with out the outrageous cancellation fees...

Reviews.Title: cant be used..
Reviews.Author: Evelyn Ramos
Reviews.Content: i dont know wat to say bout this product i bought as i sent it to my son in jamestown, ny. cuz he told me he need a phone and it had to be a verizon phone, so i got him this one. but wen he got it...he was told by verizon tat he cant use it cuz it had features which would cost him 30.00 dollars more on his plan in order for him to use it.  im still waiting for him to return me the phone, so i can return if it is still enough time to do so,

Reviews.Title: good phone, great price
Reviews.Author: Heather Rockwell
Reviews.Content: The phone was exactly as described.  Unfortunately, it wasnt's what I needed in the long run.  It came securely packed and on time.  It's a great phone for the price if all you need is a phone.

Reviews.Author: boxer909
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone thinking it was gonna be great for the price, and yes I bought it new. When the phone arrived I activated it trough Verizon. The Activation worked but the phone didn't, every time I would try to make a call I would get a message "Call Failed". Don't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: Broke in four months
Reviews.Author: Frustrated
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone as a temporary replacement until I switched carriers but now I've had to find another temporary replacement as this phone completely broke within four months time. During that time period the phone would occasionally shut down for no reason and then have to boot up again. But it was not frequent so it was something I could live with. UNTIL one day it decided to reboot but never got started again. I cannot turn the phone on ... or off. When the battery is on, it is in a constant mode of trying to reboot. White screen with an hour glass. Black screen. Again. And again. It is so bad that Verizon cannot even retrieve my contacts. Terrible product. Do not purchase!

Reviews.Title: 100% GREAT PRODUCT, AMAZING BUY!
Reviews.Author: BPapagni
Reviews.Content: I ordered a BRAND NEW (in the original box)Blackberry 8703e and its a great product! Works like a charm! Inexpensive, working overall GREAT BUY! I highly recomend this product if you want a blackberry! And I paid less than $20!

Reviews.Title: unlocking phone
Reviews.Author: lucky
Reviews.Content: I just got my blackberry today! when I turned on the phone it is asking for a password for it... Can someone help me out what is the password is so I can take it to Verizon to hook up my phone.. Verizon told me they can't hook it up until the phone is unlocked.. So please help me out. I'm new with Blackberry!!

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: suemax231
Reviews.Content: For what I wanted it for, it works great.  The only problem I have encountered is discovering what I actually have to do if I want to activate phone service.  I haven't yet found a clear answer for this online or in any of the written materials that came with my phone.  But I use it mostly as a PDA, since those features are available without activating the phone.

Reviews.Title: Pride was right but...
Reviews.Author: Myraskis
Reviews.Content: My rotten spoiled son preferred to have no phone to this phone.  It's generations old, no camera and big.I certainly would rather have this than none.  Anyway the seller took it back and I was grateful.

Reviews.Title: angry customer
Reviews.Author: angry customer
Reviews.Content: Was very disappointed in the product doesn't charge all the way can't get apps pictures or ringtones so pretty much its a useless phone to me and will not purchase another one but the company that sold it to me is a good one so ill consider buying something else from them

Reviews.Title: this phone is on the lost or stolen list at verizon
Reviews.Author: DAVE_SMITH55
Reviews.Content: went to my local verizon store and spent almost an hour having them try to activate this phone and they finalally figured out with the help of customer service that this phone belonded to a corporation and that it is on a lost or stolen list and cant be used NOT A GOOD DEAL

Reviews.Title: Will it work with T-mobile?
Reviews.Author: Anh Quy Nguyen
Reviews.Content: My T-mobile phone is broken. Can anyone let me know will this phone work with my current T-mobile sim. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: WORST PURCHASE EVER
Reviews.Author: Harmony Palacky
Reviews.Content: WHAT A WASTE OF MONEY. I HAVE HAD "CAN AND STRING PHONES" WHEN I WAS A CHILD THAT WORKED BETTER THAN THIS PHONE AND WISH I HAD SLEPT OUT THE DAY INSTEAD OF WASTING MONEY ON THE PHONE. CAN ANYONE HELP MR TO GET A REFUND??? PLEASE REPLY TO JIMNHARM@YAHOO.COM

Reviews.Title: WORST PHONE EVER@
Reviews.Author: Sarasonicx
Reviews.Content: This phone is junk. Completely worthless. It would shut off randomly and then have these random spurts to where I would not recieve any of my texts or calls! What a rip off!

Reviews.Title: Great company
Reviews.Author: Jane
Reviews.Content: The product was in great condition but our Verizon plan required us to upgrade to a data package so we had to return it.  The return was very easy and our account was credited.  We ended up purchasing another phone from this group that didn't require the data plan upgrade and are very happy.

Reviews.Title: raw deal- you cannot get web access but it requires data free of $30
Reviews.Author: B. Baker "mamabaker"
Reviews.Content: this looks great, no problems activating, but wait until you try to access the web. YOU CAN'T - BUT YOU WILL BE PAYING THE $29.99 DATA ACCESS CHARGE. This phone is missing the e-mail and browser icons. Needless to say, I am infuriated that anyone would sell this.

ProductInfo.Features:
This product has been carefully audited and is certified to be 100% functional.
This offer includes the following accessories 1. Battery 2. Battery Cover (if applicable) 3. Wall Charger
ProductInfo.Name: Verizon BlackBerry 8703e Smartphone Black No Contract Cell Phone
